  <script src="https://unpkg.com/web-vitals/dist/web-vitals.base.umd.js">

  <script>
   function sendToGTM({ name, delta, id }) {
        dataLayer.push({
            event: 'web-vitals',
            event_category: 'Web Vitals',
            event_action: name,
            event_label: id,
            event_value: Math.round(name === 'CLS' ? delta * 1000 : delta),
        });
    }

    addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
        webVitals.getCLS(sendToGTM);
        webVitals.getFID(sendToGTM);
        webVitals.getLCP(sendToGTM);
        webVitals.getFCP(sendToGTM);
        webVitals.getTTFB(sendToGTM);
    });
  </script>

   (function (w, d, s, l, i) {

        w[l].push({
            'gtm.start': new Date().getTime(),
            event: 'gtm.js'
        });

        var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
            j = d.createElement(s),
            dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';

        j.async = true;
        j.src = 'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl + '&gtm_auth=X69NLsrhtl3OBGOfYCARrA&gtm_preview=env-2&gtm_cookies_win=x';
        f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
    })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-N5S5JMM');

       <div class="banner hide-banner">
        <div class="inner-banner">
         <div class="inner-block">
          <label class="banner-text">
           Chi ama i libri sceglie Kobo e inMondadori
          </label>
          <img class="banner-img" src="//kbdownload1-a.akamaihd.net/images/OneStore/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000075@2x"/>

        <script type="text/javascript">
         /* <![CDATA[ */
        window.onload = function() {
	        jQuery.getJSON('/MarketingContentWidget/GetCurrentBanner').success(function (data) {
	            if (data && data.Data && data.Data.WelcomeText) {
	                jQuery(".banner").removeClass("hide-banner");
	
	                jQuery(".banner-text").text(data.Data.WelcomeText);
	                jQuery(".banner-img").attr("src", data.Data.ImageUrl);
	                
	                if (data.Data.LinkUrl)
	                {
	                    jQuery(".banner").addClass("partner_clickable");
	                    jQuery(".banner-text").addClass("partner_clickable");
	                    jQuery(".banner-img").addClass("partner_clickable");
	
	                    jQuery(".partner_clickable").on("click", function () { window.location = data.Data.LinkUrl; });
	                }
	            }
	        }); 
        };
        /* ]]> */
        </script>
       </div>

        <section class="spotlight" data-track-info='{"productId":"0c022748-6c01-47c0-bfae-c1c0e14fe5cb","listId":"a3cc2771-4465-48ea-a865-4af875f9411f"}' id="featured-ebook-savings">
         <div class="item-image" data-force-track="" data-track-info='{"description":"coverImage"}'>
          <a aria-hidden="true" href="https://www.kobo.com/us/en/ebook/wow-no-thank-you-1" tabindex="-1">
           <div class="image-actions image-container product-type-icon-container book">
            <img alt="Wow, No Thank You. - Essays ebook by Samantha Irby" class="cover-image notranslate_alt" src="//kbimages1-a.akamaihd.net/1f366f23-4587-466b-bf2d-0e73c4fb6368/210/316/False/wow-no-thank-you-1.jpg"/>
            <div class="product-type-icon">
            </div>
           </div>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="description-column">
          <a href="https://www.kobo.com/us/en/ebook/wow-no-thank-you-1" translate="no">
           <div class="secondary-heading widget-title" data-track-info='{"description":"title"}'>
            Featured eBook Savings
           </div>
           <div class="widget-text-description" data-track-info='{"description":"editorial"}'>
            <h1>
             <span style="font-size:24px">
              Only
              <strong>
               $2.99!
              </strong>
              (Was $11.99)
             </span>
            </h1>
            <p>
             Irby is forty, and increasingly uncomfortable in her own skin despite what Inspirational Instagram Infographics have promised her. She has left her job as a receptionist at a veterinary clinic, has published successful books and has been friendzoned by Hollywood, left Chicago, and moved into a house with a garden that requires repairs and know-how with her wife in a Blue town in the middle of a Red state where she now hosts book clubs and makes mason jar salads. This is the bourgeois life of a Hallmark Channel dream. She goes on bad dates with new friends, spends weeks in Los Angeles taking meetings with "tv executives slash amateur astrologers" while being a "cheese fry-eating slightly damp Midwest person," "with neck pain and no cartilage in [her] knees," who still hides past due bills under her pillow.
            </p>
           </div>
          </a>
         </div>

                <div class="item book basic-item">
                 <a class="carousel-tab-navigation-target notranslate_title" data-track-info='{"description":"MainCTA"}' href="/us/en/ebook/romancing-mister-bridgerton-with-2nd-epilogue">

       <div class="spotlight-widget-container kobo-widget kobo-gizmo">
        <section class="spotlight" data-track-info='{"productId":"f53fbe45-209f-4b25-9f5d-912b334792e7","listId":"00cdba58-06bf-c2fe-f600-08d5f7282021"}' id="reese-witherspoons-book-club-pick">
         <div class="item-image" data-force-track="" data-track-info='{"description":"coverImage"}'>
          <a aria-hidden="true" href="https://www.kobo.com/us/en/ebook/infinite-country-1" tabindex="-1">
           <div class="image-actions image-container product-type-icon-container book">
            <img alt="Infinite Country - A Novel ebook by Patricia Engel" class="cover-image notranslate_alt" src="//kbimages1-a.akamaihd.net/e7a88df8-3efc-49e7-bad3-52243adfffa3/210/316/False/infinite-country-1.jpg"/>
            <div class="product-type-icon">
            </div>
           </div>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="description-column">
          <a href="https://www.kobo.com/us/en/ebook/infinite-country-1" translate="no">
           <div class="secondary-heading widget-title" data-track-info='{"description":"title"}'>
            Reese Witherspoon's Book Club Pick
           </div>
           <div class="widget-text-description" data-track-info='{"description":"editorial"}'>
            <p>
             Talia is being held at a correctional facility for adolescent girls in the forested mountains of Colombia after committing an impulsive act of violence that may or may not have been warranted. She urgently needs to get out and get back home to Bogotá, where her father and a plane ticket to the United States are waiting for her. If she misses her flight, she might also miss her chance to finally be reunited with her family in the north.
            </p>
            <p>
            </p>
            <p>
             How this family came to occupy two different countries, two different worlds, comes into focus like twists of a kaleidoscope.
            </p>
           </div>
          </a>
         </div>

                </span>
               </a>
              </h2>
              <div class="editorialcopy">
               <span class="small">
                These debuts are the best way to discover something new this
               </span>
               <span class="med-no-ellipse">
                year.
               </span>
               <span class="large-no-ellipse">
               </span>
               <span class="jumbo">
               </span>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="action-items-container">
              <div class="view-all-link">
               <a aria-label="View all New authors we can&amp;#39;t wait to read" class="primary-link" data-track-info='{"description":"view all"}' href="/us/en/list/new-authors-we-can-t-wait-to-read/Mr5_UhGvi8vmrQjXkJbN9w">
                View all
               </a>

       <div class="spotlight-widget-container kobo-widget kobo-gizmo">
        <section class="spotlight" data-track-info='{"productId":"c60e041d-aa88-4eda-8d61-f7316f157e13","listId":"c8d55354-f9e8-c01d-19bb-08d52c5b183d"}' id="oprahs-book-club-pick">
         <div class="item-image" data-force-track="" data-track-info='{"description":"coverImage"}'>
          <a aria-hidden="true" href="https://www.kobo.com/us/en/ebook/the-gilead-novels-oprah-s-book-club" tabindex="-1">
           <div class="image-actions image-container product-type-icon-container book">
            <img alt="The Gilead Novels (Oprah's Book Club) ebook by Marilynne Robinson" class="cover-image notranslate_alt" src="//kbimages1-a.akamaihd.net/3d92b99f-f91d-47cc-ac9d-a1cb98f0a20b/210/316/False/the-gilead-novels-oprah-s-book-club.jpg"/>
            <div class="product-type-icon">
            </div>
           </div>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="description-column">
          <a href="https://www.kobo.com/us/en/ebook/the-gilead-novels-oprah-s-book-club" translate="no">
           <div class="secondary-heading widget-title" data-track-info='{"description":"title"}'>
            Oprah's Book Club Pick
           </div>
           <div class="widget-text-description" data-track-info='{"description":"editorial"}'>
            <p>
             Marilynne Robinson’s Gilead series—
             <em>
              Gilead, Home, Lila, and Jack
             </em>
             —is an intergenerational story about faith, race, and love radiating out from the interwoven histories of two families in a small Iowa town to encompass all of American life: our ideals and beliefs, our contradictions, failings, and hopes.
            </p>
            <p>
            </p>
            <p>
             Over the past sixteen years, Marilynne Robinson’s now-mythical world of Gilead, Iowa, and the beloved characters who inhabit it, have illuminated and interrogated the complexities of American history, the power of our emotions, and the wonders of a sacred world.
            </p>
            <p>
            </p>
            <p>
             These four novels, which have won one Pulitzer Prize and two National Book Critics Circle Awards, among many other honors, are a vital contribution to contemporary American literature and a revelation of our national character and humanity.
            </p>
           </div>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="sidebar-column">
          <div class="sidebar-item-description">
           <div class="contributors">

               Marilynne Robinson
              </a>
             </span>
            </p>
           </div>

       <div class="spotlight-widget-container kobo-widget kobo-gizmo">
        <section class="spotlight" data-track-info='{"productId":"be1c585f-3803-413c-9dbf-48f63b6ccf5f","listId":"5eb4e75a-a597-c3fb-d0d8-08d5f7272d6e"}' id="best-of-the-month">
         <div class="item-image" data-force-track="" data-track-info='{"description":"coverImage"}'>
          <a aria-hidden="true" href="https://www.kobo.com/us/en/ebook/act-your-age-eve-brown-1" tabindex="-1">
           <div class="image-actions image-container product-type-icon-container book">
            <img alt="Act Your Age, Eve Brown - A Novel ebook by Talia Hibbert" class="cover-image notranslate_alt" src="//kbimages1-a.akamaihd.net/81f1b076-8bbb-4c94-8dee-1b4f1bd0d321/210/316/False/act-your-age-eve-brown-1.jpg"/>
            <div class="product-type-icon">
            </div>
           </div>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="description-column">
          <a href="https://www.kobo.com/us/en/ebook/act-your-age-eve-brown-1" translate="no">
           <div class="secondary-heading widget-title" data-track-info='{"description":"title"}'>
            Best of the Month
           </div>
           <div class="widget-text-description" data-track-info='{"description":"editorial"}'>
            <p>
             You’ve met Chloe and Dani. Now it’s time to meet their sister, Eve Brown.
            </p>
            <p>
            </p>
            <p>
             Eve is a certified hot mess. Jacob Wayne is always in control. Then Eve hits Jacob with her car—supposedly by accident—and breaks his arm, leaving his bed and breakfast understaffed.
            </p>
            <p>
            </p>
            <p>
             Before long, Eve has infiltrated his work, his kitchen—and his spare bedroom. Jacob hates everything about it. But the heat between them is impossible to ignore... and it’s melting Jacob’s frosty exterior.
            </p>
           </div>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="sidebar-column">

    /* -- Media query 3 (mq3) - Large View */
    @media only screen and (min-width:881px) and (max-width:1140px) {
        .mq3-container{width:auto!important;margin:0 1.25em!important}.mq3-col-full{clear:both;display:block;float:left;width:100%}.mq3-col-nine-tenths{width:90%}.mq3-col-four-fifths{width:80%}.mq3-col-three-quarters{width:75%}.mq3-col-seven-tenths{width:70%}.mq3-col-two-thirds{width:66.666666%}.mq3-col-three-fifths{width:60%}.mq3-col-five-ninths{width:55.555555%}.mq3-col-eleven-twentieths{width:55%}.mq3-col-one-half{width:50%}.mq3-col-nine-twentieths{width:45%}.mq3-col-four-ninths{width:44.444444%}.mq3-col-two-fifths{width:40%}.mq3-col-one-third{width:33.333333%}.mq3-col-three-tenths{width:30%}.mq3-col-one-quarter{width:25%}.mq3-col-one-fifth{width:20%}.mq3-col-one-tenth{width:10%}.mq3-hidden{display:none!important}
    }
    /* -- Media query 4 (mq4) - Jumbo View */
    @media only screen and (min-width: 1141px) {
        .mq4-container{width:1140px!important;margin:0 auto!important}.mq4-col-full{clear:both;display:block;float:left;width:100%}.mq4-col-nine-tenths{width:90%}.mq4-col-four-fifths{width:80%}.mq4-col-three-quarters{width:75%}.mq4-col-seven-tenths{width:70%}.mq4-col-two-thirds{width:66.666666%}.mq4-col-three-fifths{width:60%}.mq4-col-five-ninths{width:55.555555%}.mq4-col-eleven-twentieths{width:55%}.mq4-col-one-half{width:50%}.mq4-col-nine-twentieths{width:45%}.mq4-col-four-ninths{width:44.444444%}.mq4-col-two-fifths{width:40%}.mq4-col-one-third{width:33.333333%}.mq4-col-three-tenths{width:30%}.mq4-col-one-quarter{width:25%}.mq4-col-one-fifth{width:20%}.mq4-col-one-tenth{width:10%}.mq4-hidden{display:none!important}

  margin:0px auto;

  line-height: 24px;
  margin:0px;
  padding:0px;
  width:95%;
}

  text-decoration: none;
  color: black;
}

  /*font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', 'Helvetica', sans-serif;*/

  font-weight: 400;
  margin:0px;
  padding:0px;
}

  font-size: 22px;
  /*font-size:24px;*/
  line-height: auto;
  margin: 0px 0px 10px;
}

  font-size:16px;
  font-style: italic;
  margin-bottom:10px;
  line-height: auto;
}

    text-align: center;
}

  float:left;
}

  float:right;

}

}

  display:block;

  display:none;
}

      color:#bf0000;
      text-decoration: none;
      position:relative;
      top:33px;
    }

      display:none;
    }

      color:#bf0000;
      padding-top: 30px;
    }
